data.lyric:
[ti:Christmas (Baby Please Come Home)]
[ar:Darlene Love]
[al:A Christmas with Love]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Christmas (Baby Please Come Home) - Darlene Love (达琳·洛芙)
[00:17.22]The snow's coming down
[00:19.03]
[00:20.54]I'm watching it fall
[00:23.03]
[00:24.30]Lots of people around
[00:26.66]
[00:27.98]Baby please come home
[00:30.26]
[00:31.60]The church bells in town
[00:33.90]
[00:35.32]All singing in song
[00:37.53]
[00:39.05]Full of happy sounds
[00:41.24]
[00:42.70]Baby please come home
[00:44.81]
[00:45.54]They're singing Deck The Halls
[00:48.62]
[00:49.31]But it's not like Christmas at all
[00:52.21]
[00:52.98]'Cause I remember when you were here
[00:56.05]
[00:56.67]And all the fun we had last year
[01:00.03]
[01:01.16]Pretty lights on the tree
[01:03.36]
[01:04.74]I'm watching them shine
[01:07.33]
[01:08.56]You should be here with me
[01:10.73]
[01:12.20]Baby please come home
[01:14.58]
[01:29.89]They're singing Deck The Halls
[01:33.04]
[01:33.55]But it's not like Christmas at all
[01:37.11]'Cause I remember when you were here
[01:40.78]And all the fun we had last year
[01:44.04]
[01:45.30]If there was a way
[01:47.83]
[01:49.08]I'd hold back this tear
[01:51.60]
[01:52.70]But it's Christmas day
[01:55.26]
[01:56.16]Please
[01:57.28]
[01:57.94]Please
[01:59.36]Please
[02:00.00]Please
[02:00.98]Please
[02:01.91]Please
[02:02.82]Baby please come home
[02:05.06]
[02:06.37]Baby please come home
[02:09.19]
[02:10.12]Baby please come home
[02:13.24]
[02:13.82]Baby please come home
[02:16.28]Oh yeah
[02:19.09]
[02:20.84]Baby please come home
[02:22.71]
[02:24.57]Please come home
